metadata.Title: CVE-2023-3214 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Use after free in Autofill payments in Google Chrome prior to114.0.5735.133 allowed a remote attacker to potentially exploit heapcorruption via a crafted HTML page. (Chromium security severity: Critical)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
